# scrollIndicatorInsets

**Instance Property**

The distance the scroll indicators are inset from the edge of the scroll view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var scrollIndicatorInsets: UIEdgeInsets { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIEdgeInsets/zero].
